nodes.text: The Gadrin Judicial Center was a court house in the city of Gadrin on the planet Cularin. Operated by the Cularin Judicial Branch, the Judicial Center heard cases throughout the time of the Galactic Republic and leading up to the Clone Wars. A large building with several spires dotting its rooftop, the entrance was adorned with a statue of Reidi Artom. The Vultan Echari Di'San faced a trial at the center after he was accused of killing Rysko Barnt in a bar fight.
